entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mono WASM PInvoke Table generation does not handle file scoped types #93999
  • Running process on shared .NET 6 runtime encounters "could not load assembly" error after Windows Update #93995
  • `System.Linq.Queryable.Tests` native crash for `mono_interpreter` `Debian.11.Amd64` #93990
  • Allow XUnitLogChecker to Work Without Paths #93988
    9.0.0
  • Build Fails When Trying to Use the Local App Host Pack #93978
    9.0.0
  • .Net 6.0 Application shows error prompt for ".Net Desktop Runtime" #93977
  • FrozenDictionary is incorrectly case sensitive in some cases #93974
  • [debugger][mono][codespaces] Debug Blazor app from Codespaces #93973
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Show correct datatypes for int, long, double #93971
    9.0.0
  • Unneccesary `Task.Run` in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host #93970
  • Object reference not set to an instance of an object exception in NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() #93969
  • NullReferenceException sometimes in System.Text.Json on iOS/MAUI #93967
  • 100GB memory usage in .NET 8 RC-2 and RC-1 #93966
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: mask #93964
  • GC.GetConfigurationVariables() not showing 'System.GC.LOHThreshold' #93963
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (995) #93958
  • Test failure ilasm\\System\\Runtime\\CompilerServices\\MethodImplOptionsTests\\MethodImplOptionsTests.cmd #93955
    9.0.0
  • Suboptimal codegen for Enum.HasFlag(A) || Enum.HasFlag(B) #93954

Closed

  • Better error message for dotnet exec of an app with mismatched architecture #92281
  • dotnet 7 causes Segmentation fault on arm64 platforms #93047
    9.0.0
  • Vector128 intrinsic causing crashes on ARM platform. #93912
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make OpCode.StackChange() public #93419
    9.0.0
  • Investigate Mono performance for certain Xamarin Mac benchmarks #50455
    Future
  • Crash - JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/BenchmarksGame/binarytrees/binarytrees-5/binarytrees-5.sh #73455
    9.0.0
  • DateTime.TryParseExact() fails to parse valid date #93975
  • Inconsistency when Parsing System.Reflection.AssemblyMetadataAttribute Value #93781
  • [NativeAOT] No way to dll export variables? #93936
  • [Breaking change?] Exception "Reflection-based serialization has been disabled for this application" is thrown on Mac Release #92345
    8.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Unnecessary nullcheck in Exchange_long benchmark #44087
    9.0.0
  • Atomics are missing from `GenTree::OperExceptions` #92784
    9.0.0
  • Empty string Deserialize can null Enum with System.Text.Json #93960
  • Sometimes `testhost/CoreRun` crashes with `System.Diagnostics.Tracing`-related assertion failure #92519
    9.0.0
  • List<T> Insert() - optimize memory copying #89915
    Future
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription for stable servicing releases includes the full build information in the version suffix #45812
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Precompiling failed for System.Private.CoreLib.dll with exit code 134 #93188
    9.0.0
  • Outerloop test System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.Stress_WriteConcurrently_DoesntCrash crashing often #93569
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update diasymreader version to 16.11.29-beta1.23404.4 #93998
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: move return merging earlier #93997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle null signature destinations for ECDsa / DSA / RSA #93996
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Implement PriorityQueue.Remove #93994
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Update library-servicing doc to mention 8.0 #93993
    documentation, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-staging] do not contain `LEA` if offset < 0` #93992
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Remove rd.xml from S.C.I tests #93991
    area-System.Collections
  • Test macOS runtime test crash dump collection #93989
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Simplify of OffsetToStringData as it's done on coreclr #93987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #93984
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Revert "[arm64] Addressing modes for SIMD (#67490)" #93981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix double delims at the end of dirnames in tpa string #93962
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Optimize Interlocked.CompareExchange use in Task #93953
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution

Merged

  • Move JIT's clang-tidy flags into configuration files and add a root clang-tidy config that disables all checks. #93951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle null signature destinations for ECDsa / DSA / RSA #93985
    area-System.Security
  • do not contain `LEA` if offset < 0` #93983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update MsQuic #93979
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93875
    area-VM-threading-mono
  • Support IValidatableObject for nested model types in options source gen #93952
    area-Extensions-Options, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't use File.OpenWrite when trying to overwrite a file in illink/wasm build tasks #93854
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.1
  • Consider atomics throwing #93610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid extra `Array.Copy` in `List<T>.Insert(Range)` when the list is full #90089
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription test to validate version #93913
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Abstract out LocalBuilder, emit Locals with new ILGenerator #93809
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93902
    area-VM-coreclr
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Draft] Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Implement the ComVariant struct, the ComVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to build with tfm=net9.0 #93693
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][amd64] Pass and return SIMD values in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Suppress few more MSVC warnings #93923
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #93874
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Made threadstatic helper call sites slightly simpler (static ctor case) #90641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the perf issue in TensorPrimitives.MinMaxCore #93944
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Disabling two socket tests #93916
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use deferred evaluation in ReadOnlyDictionary.Key/Value collections. #93870
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Disable FastTailCall in case of split arg #93655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: fix failing no-trimming test #93950
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Project dependency "Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.dll" ist not handled correctly #36465
  • .NET Project fails to start when using windows10 TFM, UseCommonOutputDirectory=true, and GenerateRuntimeConfigDevFile=true #36474
  • Swap 9.0 to current target framework #36449

Closed

  • Specifying a framework for multi-targeted dependencies that include a .NET Framework target does not work. #35341
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Update manpages for 8.0 #36447
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2301248 #36472
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable dependabot updates to 8.0.1xx #36361
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use MicrosoftAspNetCoreComponentsSdkAnalyzersPackageVersion for aspnetcore version #35571
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • APICompat & GenAPI clean-up #36353
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36149
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • upgrade stage 0 and unwind a few steps that were done for the 9.0 upg… #36437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Silence workload install logging on `dotnet --info` and related commands. #36443
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog
  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544
  • Proposal: Fast, Efficient Unions #7016

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Boxing ValueTypes heavily when calling InheritanceMarginItem.Equals => InheritanceTargetItem.Equals #70559
  • Likely incorrect `MemberNotNullWhen` application on `AttributeData.HasErrors` #70555
  • ```bool IsTargetAttribute(NamedTypeSymbol attributeClass, string namespaceName, string typeName)``` probably should check MetadataName of the type rather than just Name #70554
  • Stack overflow in CSharpSyntaxRewriter when running dotnet format on System.Private.CoreLib.csproj #70549
    17.9

Closed

  • Renamer does not rename method or property symbol references #70390
  • Incorrect suggestion or fix 'Collection initialization can be simplified' for IAsyncEnumerable #70388

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply the GitHub Copilot workaround to new-framework integration tests #70561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle authorization exceptions when reading files #70558
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove incorrect MemberNotNullWhen attribute #70557
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure errors are reported when compiler is unable to emit a required attribute. #70556
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Demonstrating broken formatting. #70551
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip code definition window tests blocked by github copilot #70546
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70545
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70560
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure we cache both the last semantic and last embedded-lang classification for a document #70550
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70553
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clean up inheritance hierarchy for CSharpAttributeData/VisualBasicAttributeData. #70519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix flakeyness in extract method test #70543
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use collection expression' with await-foreach calls #70494
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce dependency on ImmutableDictionary in CompletionItem's properties storage. #70474
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Skip elements with false conditions during evaluation #70496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70547
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Attempt to work around GitHub Copilot breaking integration tests #70532
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run analyzer consistency checks on .NET Core #70517
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP - Remove IObjectWritable #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add external access code action operation for renaming after code actions #70531
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update the approach we use to layer classifications #70522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add async operation listener to allow integration tests to wait for server side operations #70359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify BKTree.Lookup to pass the threshold to GetEditDistance when there will not be a need for the actual edit distance #70525
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make parent frame available in nested sync `catch` #70513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Resolve reference paths to absolute paths #70527
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • _CreateCompileItemsForOpenApiReferences adds generated .cs to Compile even if they are already there. #51659
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51658
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51657
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #51656
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51655
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishaot #51654
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51653
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51652
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #51651
  • Perf improvement: json #51650
  • Using a Layout defined in BlazorApp.Client project results in a exception during SSR #51648
  • Improve interaction between enhanced nav and scroll position #51646
  • Error Form Submission in asp.net Core MVC #51644
  • Questions about using AddNewtonsoftKinson during custom converter usage in .net6 #51643
  • AuthorizeRouteView not showing Authorizing child content #51642
  • Consider changing the behavior of text inputs in Blazor to treat empty string as null #51639
    .NET 9 Planning
  • AddRoles to a Blazor 8 app throws System.AggregateException #51638
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • NavigateTo doesn't work in Blazor 8 RC2 when enhanced navigation is disabled #51636
    8.0.x
  • NET8 and Blazor in the user profile with Microsoft Identity raises an error #51635
    8.0.x
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mapaction #51633
  • Perf regression: mvc, plaintext, plaintext #51632
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plaintext #51631
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query, updates #51630
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #51629
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes, updates #51628
  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries, single_query #51627
  • Perf regression: https, mapaction, mvc #51626
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #51625

Closed

  • Streaming Rendering Renders Poor Errors if an Exception Happens After Streaming Started #51619
  • I was displaying a bunch large text files inside blazor, this's what's happened #51597
  • ASP .NET 8 RC1 Routing & UseStaticFiles #50707
  • RequestDelegateGenerator "From" Attributes in AsParameters class produces compile error #51547
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #51613
  • Navigation in Interactive Server Components is broken unless Routes are Server Interactive #51594

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix trimming issue affecting Blazor apps with WebAssembly interactivity #51665
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Documenting the new help-wanted process #51664
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #51663
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #51662
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 7.0.x
  • Optimize CancellationToken handling #51660
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update area-owners.md #51647
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51637
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Fix links in daily builds table #51645
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Stabilize versions #51532
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51582
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Add info about nightly builds table, plus .deb/.rpm installers #51621
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK to 23523.1 #51588
    area-infrastructure
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [tools][trace] Add stopping event options to dotnet-trace #4363

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Add partial SOS 'clrstack' command implementation. #4356

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI - Android App crashes when using a custom scheme URL to resume with a Frame and Entry #18362
  • A drawable Line doesn't draw inside DataTemplate when HorizontalOptions is set #18359
  • Couldn't install or uninstall AndroidTools_Xamarin #18358
  • Error #18357
  • App Icon Not Showing in Android Archive #18355
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling with Star-sized grid row #18354
    Backlog
  • The width of the VisualElement is consistently -1 in the iOS native application. #18336
    Backlog
  • Android Webview`s Height is not correct at the first loading #18335
    Backlog
  • The first item is not visible in the Carousel View #18334
    Backlog
  • .NET 8: Keyboard accelerator invocation draws menu in add location on Windows #18333
    Backlog
  • [Android][ANR] crashes on Android when navigating #18331
    Backlog
  • Method to measure expected Label sizes for Android is deprecated & returns very wrong results compared to real Layout size #18328
    Backlog

Closed

  • Pairing to Mac fails in 17.7.6 with 404 error while downloading 7.0.403-servicing.23520.24. #18352
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9373] AmbiguousMatchException thrown for overloaded methods called from xaml event #17950
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0] New Projects with spaces in the names are putting those spaces into ApplicationId (instead of underscores as previously) causing failure to build #18177
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Labels with max lines and linebreakmode not working even with adding handler workaround #18059
    .NET 8 GA
  • .NET 8: Not sure that the com.apple.security.get-task-allow entitlement in templates for MacCat is required #18259
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0] Entry pushed under keyboard and off the page iOS #16784
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [regression/8.0.0] Software keyboard hides entry box #18236
    .NET 8 GA
  • CollectionView is rendered too tall #18269
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI8] [iOS] Star Height of Grid.Row with CollectionView isn't correct #18348
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] ScrollView always has a scroll bar on iOS #17224
    .NET 8 GA
  • NVDA and VO read line modes not supported #14104
    Backlog
  • .NET 8 regression: MenuBar doesn't work on MacCat #18332
  • Facing issue with firebase bitcode:App store denied my app show following error #18162
  • CATextLayer text is blurry on Catalyst and iOS #18285

PullRequests

Created

  • Partially revert "[Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout (#14532) #18356
  • [net8.0] Bump xharness for rtm #18353
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [dependabot] Limit to 0 pr's #18346
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump MemoryAnalyzers from 0.1.0-beta.3 to 0.1.0-beta.4 #18343
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Set supported version on iOS Gallery #18330

Merged

  • Merge RC 2.2 into net8.0 #18351
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Templates] Fix template typo #18166
    area/templates 📄
  • Activate enforcement of CA1859 in Core #18315
  • Update .NET 7 MAUI Version #18329
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] Bump iOS #18326
  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr9] [net7.0] Update aspnet versions #18319
  • [ci] Remove DeviceTests on iOS13.7 add Android 33 #18320
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] Ensure that viewport calculations for iOS ScrollView account for content insets #18321
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] [Templates] Remove get-task-allow entitlement from Templates #18323
  • Ensure templates create a proper AppID #18322
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] Limit star expansion when measuring/arranging at constrained sizes #18314

Updated

  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Added orientation property to slider #18057
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 9 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is EF Core 8.0 RC2 defaulting the execution strategy to SqlServerRetryingExecutionStrategy when targeting Azure SQL? #32165
  • PrincipalKey causes duplicate key problem for tracked entity #32161
  • IndexOutOfRange thrown from In-Memory when using union on owned types #32159

Closed

  • ef core optional one-to-many with nullable principal key #32131
  • Value comparisons with ToJson() #32160
  • Is it possible to configure an IReadOnlyCollection<T> where T is Keyless? #32127
  • Strong typing names in data annotations during reverse engineering where possible #32126
  • Why does EF Core try to create objects that are not present in the class? REOPEN #32101
  • EFCore 8 RC2 - Converters not getting used in some cases for an entity property which is part of JSON #32073
  • EF Core transaction order incorrect due to FK constraint #32010
  • Referencing a third table in `JOIN` clauses #31894
  • EF Core database first SQL server temporal table scaffold #31444

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix failing tests #32164
  • SqlServer: Fix FreeText parameter type mapping #32163

Merged

  • Make SQL CLR optional for running EF tests #32143

Updated

  • [Component governance] Update Azure.Identity dependency #32108
    blocked
  • Add a logo #32156

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Homebrew] dotnet formulae deprecated due to SSL 1.1 dependency #17624
  • During installation of SDK 8.0 GA, the .NET Runtime version does not match the SDK. #17627

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • dotnet build fails with error NETSDK1147 even though workload is installed #17610
    Discussion
  • About latest dotnet@6 release #15602

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17631
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17630
  • [source build] Remove resolved poisoned files from baseline #17629

Merged

  • Add feed to acquire Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks.8.0.0 #17632
  • Pin scancode version #17602
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17623

Updated

  • Use DecodeValue to check attribute values #17605
  • Update the stage 0 version and unwind a few of the upgrade changes #17617
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #17621
    Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17620
    Branch Lockdown
